name: Money Miles
description:
In Money Miles you play as a stick figure floating on a dollar bill down through miles and miles of coins. If these coins land on your bill you collect them and add their value to your score. You can then use these coins to buy extra lives just incase you collect obstacles instead!

(Use space to buy lives and a and d keys to move)

The obstacles are boulders that also fall from the sky - each dealing one life.

This is my first SDL game and is mainly a test. However, I hope that you enjoy this if you play!
